paper_title.ja: Experimental modelg of chronic tonsillar hgerniation associagted with early stage syringomyeria
16Gy 分割照射によるラット上顎部への影響
paper_title.en: The Effect of X-ray Irradiation of Fractionated 16Gy on the Rat's Maxillary Antrum

description.ja: 臨床では,上顎洞癌の治療に三者併用による放射線の照射が行われ,好成績を上げているが,放射線照射による上顎洞の照射反応を実験的に調べた報告はない。正常ラットの上顎部に16Gyを分割照射し,組織学的に検討した。16Gy分割照射による上顎洞粘膜の反応は,急性炎症の組織学的変化を示し,上皮の変性と壊死,白血球の浸潤と洞内への浸出を示した。照射による好中球の洞内への浸出,粘膜内のリンパ球様細胞浸潤,上顎骨の骨髄の造血組織の反応性増殖は,全体として免疫的防御帯を形成し,癌の再発と遠隔転移を阻止するための機構として重要な役割を担っている可能性があると推察される。
description.en: The histological effect of X-ray irradiation of fractionated 16Gy on the rat's maxillary antrum was studied. After finishing X-ray irradiation of 16Gy/8 fractions/11 days, the mucosa of the maxillary antrum showed an inflammatory reaction revealing hemorrhage, exudation of granulocytes and proliferative infiltration of lymphoid cells, and the adjacent bone marrow was overall reconverted. These remarkable changes may, as a whole, construct an immune defensive barrier against cancer invasion, recurrence and metastasis. The duration of lymphocyte infiltration may have implication for selecting the optimal time of surgery.

description.en: The histological effect of X-ray irradiation of fractionated 16Gy on the rat's maxillary antrum was studied. After finishing X-ray irradiation of 16Gy/8 fractions/11 days, the mucosa of the maxillary antrum showed an inflammatory reaction revealing hemorrhage, exudation of granulocytes and proliferative infiltration of lymphoid cells, and the adjacent bone marrow was overall reconverted. These remarkable changes may, as a whole, construct an immune defensive barrier against cancer invasion, recurrence and metastasis. The duration of lymphocyte infiltration may have implication for selecting the optimal time of surgery.
